text: [Music]
hi there i'm jeff par and i'm excited to
announce a new migration service called
AWS migration hub today we offer
multiple solutions to help you migrate
to the AWS cloud including our database
migration service server migration
service storage gateway snowball and
snowmobile some of our partners
including cloud indoor and rossini also
offer tools out migrate jws different
workloads require different migration
tools but there's no easy way to track
the state of your migration across
workloads in a single location also
existing tools don't let you track
migrations the way you actually do them
by application as a result people use
cumbersome tools which ultimately end up
slowing down their overall migration
effort migrations have helped solve this
by providing a single location to
tracked migrations across multiple AWS
and partner solutions using migration
hub allows you to choose the AWS and
partner migration tools that best fit
your needs while providing visibility in
the status of all the migration work
you're doing it also provides key
metrics and progress for individual
applications regardless of which tools
are being used to migrate them this
allows you to quickly get progress
updates across all of your migrations
easily identify and troubleshoot any
issues and reduce the overall time and
effort spent on your migration projects
to get started simply authorize the
tools you're using for your migrations
in migration hub once you've started
your migrations use migrations of the
group your servers as applications track
your status in one place and see key
migration metrics on the top-level
dashboard migration hub is available to
all eight of those customers at no
additional charge you only pay for the
cost of the migration tools you use any
resources being consumed on AWS to learn
more visit the migration hub website
thanks for watching
[Music]
